xxx.id AS id, xxx.stock_current_sum_id AS stockCurrentSumId, xxx.stock_current_id AS stockCurrentId, xxx.stock_id AS stockId, xxx.stock_code AS stockCode, xxx.stock_name AS stockName, xxx.stock_place_id_source AS stockPlaceIdSource, xxx.stock_place_code_source AS stockPlaceCodeSource, xxx.stock_place_name_source AS stockPlaceNameSource, xxx.stock_place_id_new AS stockPlaceIdNew, xxx.stock_place_code_new AS stockPlaceCodeNew, xxx.stock_place_name_new AS stockPlaceNameNew, xxx.in_batch_no AS inBatchNo, xxx.batch_no AS batchNo, xxx.bar_code AS barCode, xxx.material_id AS materialId, xxx.material_code AS materialCode, xxx.material_short_name AS materialShortName, xxx.material_spec AS materialSpec, xxx.qty AS qty, xxx.qty_allot AS qtyAllot, xxx.qty_useable AS qtyUseable, xxx.qty_freeze AS qtyFreeze, xxx.suppliar_id AS suppliarId, xxx.suppliar_code AS suppliarCode, xxx.suppliar_full_name AS suppliarFullName, xxx.move_place_date AS movePlaceDate, xxx.disposer AS disposer, xxx.department_id AS departmentId, xxx.department_code AS departmentCode, xxx.department_name AS departmentName, xxx.organization_id AS organizationId, xxx.organization_code AS organizationCode, xxx.organization_name AS organizationName, xxx.f_company_id AS fCompanyId, xxx.f_en_code AS fEnCode, xxx.f_short_name AS fShortName, xxx.create_id AS createId, xxx.create_name AS createName, xxx.create_time AS createTime, xxx.update_id AS updateId, xxx.update_name AS updateName, xxx.update_time AS updateTime, xxx.remark AS remark, xxx.is_valid AS isValid, xxx.posting_place_date AS postingPlaceDate, xxx.state AS state, xxx.move_type AS moveType, xxx.move_code AS moveCode, xxx.units_id AS unitsId, xxx.units_name AS unitsName, xxx.disposer_id AS disposerId,
mapper.select:
select
from mes_wms_stockmoveplace
is_valid = '1'
and id = #{id}
and stock_current_sum_id = #{stockCurrentSumId}
and stock_current_id = #{stockCurrentId}
and stock_id = #{stockId}
and stock_code like concat('%',#{stockCode},'%')
and stock_name like concat('%',#{stockName},'%')
and stock_place_id_source = #{stockPlaceIdSource}
and stock_place_code_source like concat('%',#{stockPlaceCodeSource},'%')
and stock_place_name_source like concat('%',#{stockPlaceNameSource},'%')
and stock_place_id_new = #{stockPlaceIdNew}
and stock_place_code_new like concat('%',#{stockPlaceCodeNew},'%')
and stock_place_name_new like concat('%',#{stockPlaceNameNew},'%')
and in_batch_no like concat('%',#{inBatchNo},'%')
and batch_no like concat('%',#{batchNo},'%')
and bar_code like concat('%',#{barCode},'%')
and material_id = #{materialId}
and material_code like concat('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and material_short_name like concat('%',#{materialShortName},'%')
and material_spec like concat('%',#{materialSpec},'%')
and qty
and qty_allot
and qty_useable
and qty_freeze
and suppliar_id = #{suppliarId}
and suppliar_code like concat('%',#{suppliarCode},'%')
and suppliar_full_name like concat('%',#{suppliarFullName},'%')
and move_place_date like concat('%',#{movePlaceDate},'%')
and disposer like concat('%',#{disposer},'%')
and department_id = #{departmentId}
and department_code like concat('%',#{departmentCode},'%')
and department_name like concat('%',#{departmentName},'%')
and organization_id = #{organizationId}
and organization_code like concat('%',#{organizationCode},'%')
and organization_name like concat('%',#{organizationName},'%')
and f_company_id = #{fCompanyId}
and f_en_code like concat('%',#{fEnCode},'%')
and f_short_name like concat('%',#{fShortName},'%')
and create_id = #{createId}
and create_name like concat('%',#{createName},'%')
and create_time
and update_id = #{updateId}
and update_name like concat('%',#{updateName},'%')
and update_time
and remark like concat('%',#{remark},'%')
and is_valid like concat('%',#{isValid},'%')
and posting_place_date like concat('%',#{postingPlaceDate},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{state},'%')
and move_type like concat('%',#{moveType},'%')
and move_code like concat('%',#{moveCode},'%')
and units_id like concat('%',#{unitsId},'%')
and units_name like concat('%',#{unitsName},'%')
and disposer_id = #{disposerId}
order by id desc

select id, stock_current_sum_id, stock_current_id, stock_id, stock_code, stock_name, stock_place_id_source, stock_place_code_source, stock_place_name_source, stock_place_id_new, stock_place_code_new, stock_place_name_new, in_batch_no, batch_no, bar_code, material_id, material_code, material_short_name, material_spec, qty, qty_allot, qty_useable, qty_freeze, suppliar_id, suppliar_code, suppliar_full_name, move_place_date, disposer, department_id, department_code, department_name, organization_id, organization_code, organization_name, f_company_id, f_en_code, f_short_name, create_id, create_name, create_time, update_id, update_name, update_time, remark, is_valid, posting_place_date, state, move_type, move_code, units_id, units_name, disposer_id from mes_wms_stockmoveplace where id = #{id}
